Gentoo Packages http://www.gentoo.org/favicon.ico http://packages.gentoo.org/feed/ Gentoo Packages2 2015-03-04T00:31:15Z <div> <span class="cpvstr">net-p2p/bitcoind-9999</span>: <span class="description">Original Bitcoin crypto-currency wallet for automated services</span> </div> http://packages.gentoo.org/package/net-p2p/bitcoind?ts=2015-03-04T00:31:15Z Anthony G. Basile (blueness) http://cia.vc/stats/author/blueness 2015-03-04T00:31:15Z
*bitcoind-0.10.0-r1 (04 Mar 2015)
04 Mar 2015; Anthony G. Basile (blueness)
+bitcoind-0.10.0-r1.ebuild, +files/0.10.0-openrc-compat.patch,
+files/bitcoind.logrotate-r1, -bitcoind-0.10.0.ebuild, bitcoind-9999.ebuild:
Dependency on leveldb and libsecp256k1 is now handled by the eclass.Fix
logrotate, bug #541510.
